output: powerpoint_presentation

```{r,echo=F,fig.dim=c(8,8)}
drawit = function(L=16,dD=-pi/2,D=-pi/2,n=1000){
    x = c(0)
    y = c(0)
    l = L
    for(i in 1:n){
        x0 = x[i]
        y0 = y[i]
        x2 = x[i]+l*cos(D)
        y2 = y[i]+l*sin(D)
        l = (l-2)%%L+1
        D = D+dD
        x = c(x,x2)
        y = c(y,y2)
    }
    xmin = min(x)
    xmax = max(x)
    xmid = mean(c(xmin,xmax))
    ymin = min(y)
    ymax = max(y)
    ymid = mean(c(ymin,ymax))
    r = max(c(xmax-xmid,ymax-ymid))
    xlo = xmid-r
    xhi = xmid+r
    ylo = ymid-r
    yhi = ymid+r
    plot(0,0,"n",axes=F,ann=F,xlim=c(xlo,xhi),ylim=c(ylo,yhi))
    lines(x,y,lwd=0.4)
}

drawit(9,2*pi/5)

```
